Blog.post: Its always suprising to hear something you've written on the guitar played by someone else.. Better yet its even more amazing to play along with someone else. I have a new friend, who is a coworker from my office who plays guitar. Suprisingly she plays in the same style I do, We've hung out and played a couple nights and what a difference it makes! We hope to have our first little song recorded soon which has been titled by Alicia "Waiting for Katie". I just need to come up with a decient solo ;) Work goes on and on this week, same old nothing.. Boring as hell.. Bleh.. Oh and Bonnie sucks :D

Working in Foresthill sucks, I always forget to post to this thing. My neck has been stiff all week and I feel like I am going to wake up paralyzed one of these days. I could be so lucky. :P I love it when your subconcious plays tricks on you in your sleep so you have BIZZARE dreams. I had a VERY strange one last night involving Katie, that made me wake up quickly. Stupid subconcious. Stupid.. Speaking of Katie, I am in the process of writing her a letter. I found a pretty little flower that I am going to put in the letter, it should put a little smile on her face. Although knowing my luck she'll be allergic to it. :D I need to call her mom in the morning and find out how my mermaid is doing. I really hope with all my heart that she is a little less depressed. My poor angel. :( I have been talking to a new friend this week, its a friend of Keven's friends. Another teenage angst type of person. Except there is one difference, she seems to like to try and seem like the smartest person in the world. I got quite pissed off the other day when she started talking down to me about some completely stupid thing. Where in the hell does Keven find these people? Good lord! I realised the other day that my birthday is in a month. Oh goodie. I bet no one remembers like usual. Sort of like last year. ;) Atleast I will be down in LA this year, maybe Missy or Danny Boy will remember.

Well after nearly a week I am back to posting here again. Finally :) Friday I recieved word from Katie's mom that Katie was home. She was in a car accident in AZ, and had just gotten home the day before. I was terrified of how bad Katie was hurt, and from what I have heard and seen of Katie's truck she got banged up pretty good. Right now she has a broken collar bone, is bruised up everywhere and lost the nerves in her foot. I was already planning to head down to LA over the weekend so I worked to fit in a side trip to hopefully see Katie. However Katie isn't letting anyone see her so I didn't get the chance. :( I did however get to see her mom and dropped off some things for Katie, including my favorite lamp that I hoped would put a smile on her face. From what I hear it did, which made me happy. But the important thing is that I was there, I might not have gotten to see her, but I was there for her. I sat at the cliffs for a while and did some thinking. For the first time ever, I didn't feel out of place there. I wasn't nervous or scared. I was there, it felt natural to me, like I have been there everyday of the past 2 years. Late Sunday night I made the long trek home, I didn't get back until 9am. I managed to sleep and get a whole 2 hours of work in. WOO HOO! This week starts the week that I work in Foresthill again, I don't know how long I am going to be here, but I really am already starting to hate it all over again. Oh well you can't win them all ;) Tonight as I sleep I will watch over Katie, I only hope she gets rest tonight. She's had a rough past 2 weeks.

Is it Thursday already? Good lord. Keven ditched me to go to Tracy and visit his friends down there. I guess things just got too boring for him around here, that bastard! I guess I know where I rate ;) I noticed fark.com's new personal ads seem to have some VERY strange looking people on them. Not that they are unattractive or anything, just their pictures seem odd. The fellow on there earlier today sort of looked like a neanderthal ;) Now the current girl on there looks like she needs to wear less makeup and not be stoned. Who am I to judge anyway? I look 40 most of the time. I upset my friend Hilary today. I was talking to her about how Keven feels and that he isn't sure what to do. Somehow we wound up talking about her visit down with Katie (Not that Katie) to watch a movie. I made a mention that because she was semi cuddled up to Keven that left me and Katie sort of sitting there and I knew Katie wanted someone to cuddle up to. Well I wasn't going to cuddle up to anyone, and once they put on that chick flick I made the effort to leave (without telling anyone) because I felt like a piece of meat. Hilary apologised and said that wasn't the intention and such. I believe her wholly but I still felt the way I did, its not her or Katie's fault but I couldn't help the way I felt. Since then Hilary hasn't talked to me. :( Work, work, work, today! I have been trying to get an online shopping cart done for a customer. I made some major progress today and hope to have it finished tomorrow. Of course that all depends on if they want any changes done to it afterwards. Starting next week I have to go to work in Foresthill again for a while, which means I will now go from no money, to well negative money. It will be interesting to see how I am going to have to balance money to actually GET to work. I don't know how I am going to eat. I found out Yesterday that it was the last day of classes at UofA. I assume now that Katie will be home earlier than I expected. I am excited to know that I will get to talk to her again soon. However at the same time I am also scared. I don't really feel like I know what is going on between her and I at the moment. Are we still together? Are we not? Will she have found someone else? Questions... I do know one thing is for sure. It has been 4 months that she has been gone, I have missed her everyday I didn't talk to her with all of my soul. I hold on to my heart and to my feelings, I keep my head up and I walk forward hoping for the best. I know that my love hasn't faded, that I still love her as much as I always have. I hold on to that love because its part of who I am, and because I learned long ago to fight for what I believe in. Out of all things in this world I believe in her and I, and deep down somewhere I know she does too.

I overslept today. Of course the traffic on 49 was awful. And they decided to work on one of the bridges by the time I got to it. So I had to make a detour and go back to the freeway and drive to Colfax and cut over 174. Whoopie! Things at the museum are going well, I noticed today that the gift shop is coming together. Not only that our locomotive is coming along nicely, the air brake plumbing was finished today and it was quite impressive to see the needle on the pressure gauge rise as we charged the system. Not only that it was more impressive to HEAR the sound of a functioning system. :) I finished getting the hardware on the fireman's door done today. We atleast have one complete door now. ;) The big move from the shop to the museum building is Saturday, hopefully we will have the final touches done in time. I lost track of time and wound up being late for work, coupled with the fact I had to take the detour I was an hour and a half late. :/ Of course when I got here the boss asked what happened to a project he gave me yesterday. A project I finished and told my supervisor that was done. Turns out someone had went in and changed the template on me AFTER I made the change to one that didn't have this special link. So I had to go and set the stupid thing up again. I read an email from Katie today, an old one from a year ago after we had fought through some tough times. I read the words she wrote, and just thought in my head about how she is still after 2 years every bit the same woman I am in love with. I miss her terribly but I know she is with me everyday. I should hear from her in 2 weeks so I am excited. I hope to get her package mailed out at the end of this week, but it depends on if I can get a picture I want to send her or not. Otherwise I might just drop the whole thing off by her house when I go down to LA later this month. Either way I know she will love what I am sending her. Speaking of people I care about, why is it that I can't find a single person to go on a late night drive with me? Everyone can't be a bunch of wussies can they? Oh well, tomorrow is another day, and another couple dollars.

Ahh yes another Monday. I have decided to keep this log to write down my thoughts I might have during the day or basicly how I am feeling. Today started out like every other day: Get up, late for work, get to work, get hungry, starve, lunch time. I did manage to get help from Keven to clean out and wash my car. Now my car is white again :) One the work front today I managed to get a few little things done which will make the boss happy I suppose. Tonight looks like gaming night over at Keven's he's been wanting me to play computer games with him the past few days now, I guess I shall humor him. ;) One good thing has come out of today atleast, the fact that I get to work at the museum tomorrow. YAY!

Sometimes when you least expect it life throws you that curveball. Other times you get the pitch you expect. Today Katie and I decided to be friends. We are going to always be close, and I'll be damned if I wont be the best friend that I can be. I can't say that I am not sad, or my heart isn't broken. I am. But at the same time, I am glad that she will still be in my life. I had always feared that if she left, she would go for good leaving me with a hole that would never be filled. There are times when no matter how much you love someone, you have to let them grow and you have to let them experience the world for themselves. It is time for my Katie to spread her wings, and fly. Time for her to start on her life.. Time for her to be ready to great things. I know that I will always be part of her life, that I will never fade away or be forgotten. I will always be here for her. I will love and carry her with me, part of my life forever. The future is not written, and no one can say what will happen a few years from now. I need to be a friend, a best friend, to be supportive and listen, to love unconditionally. So today my life has changed.. But then again.. Everyday things change, basicly they stay the same. In one way or another.

I hate drama, I really do! Things have been hell lately, and worst of all I was trying hard to stay out of it.. Yes I did a few things that I shouldn't have but nothing as bad as I am getting hell for.. I went overboard Sunday and told someone off and I really shouldn't have. Worst of all my Katie has stopped talking to me, and I did nothing to cause that. Its sad and hurts quite a bit. I am not sure if I will ever talk to her again and that wasn't my fault.. I just want to cry now.. The only good news in the past week is that I might be getting a new job that is closer to home and pays more.. We'll see how that goes. But if this past week is a vision of things to come then I am screwed.. C'est La Vie

The End Of An Era Tonight I get the lovely task of cleaning up my desk here at the Auburn office. Because of money issues we are being moved to a smaller area in the back of the building and sadly there wont be room for my computer there. Its sad to know that I am "leaving" this place, so many things happened the nights I sat here. Most were good, but there were some bad ones. My life changed here at this desk in many ways, for the past 6 months I've been here everyday. I will always remember the days here, smiling at my picture of Katie on my desk, the days I laughed, cried or was angry. Now that I am in Foresthill again things aren't the same, it doesn't feel like my office. I don't even really feel like I am at work up there. It is strange to feel like a place, even one that you didn't like much was such a special place. I guess I only realise it now when I am leaving. In the end its just another day of life and the end of an era so to speak.

I can't believe its been so long since I updated this. Things have been nearly a sort of hell the past few weeks.. It seems like when I have a good day, I can expect the next one to be bad. There are days when I am so tired, I just don't want to wake up. This last sunday has to have been one of the worst days I've had in a long time. I dropped and broke what little mayo I had left. I got a flat tire.. I had to get a ride to the office only to be abandoned there and had to walk 10 miles to get home. Monday I was sore as hell, I had to do the "70 year old shuffle" all day long. I am in the process of changing my life for the better. I need to firmly plant my roots in the earth. This week I am going to be in search of a new job where I will be paid better and one that I will enjoy so I can not have to be broke all the time. Among other things I am going to try and start taking more time for myself. I've noticed in the past few months I have spent most of my days "for others" and not enough for me. Katie has decided to move up here and come to UC Davis and it will be nice to have her around. There are a lot of things that her and I can still do and many things that she will enjoy as much as I will. Just the other day a friend of 9 years told me that there was something wrong with me.. He said that I don't seem the same, that there seems to be something missing. In many ways he is right, since I broke up with Katie I haven't been feeling right, like something is missing. I am doing everything I can to be a friend and a damn good one at that. But there are times where I feel like I am annoying her, and there are other times when she isn't telling me things because she doesn't want me to get upset. The sad part is that they aren't things I would get upset over.. They are little things I wouldn't think twice about but it hurts when she wont even mention them to me. That and that alone hurts.. Somedays it seems like she's forgotten who I am. Then again maybe she wants to forget..

Its been a long time since I wrote in here. The past 2 days have been days of hell. Katie is upset with me because there have been some things said by other parties to her which I "apparently" said. But I know I did not say them. I've been trying to cope with the feeling of being almost hunted. I don't know where these things came from that were said, but I know I never said them, they aren't things I would say. I have a bad feeling that some sort of nasty telephone game is going on. Whats worse is that she is starting to not believe me and it hurts me deep down inside. In the entire nearly 3 years that I've known Katie I have done nothing but be openly honest and truthful to her. I have and will always be that way to her because I know she does the same to me. Not only that but I find it hard to lie at all, even about little things. I seem to tell the truth more than I probably should at times. I've had to kick Rob out last week. He had been bad mouthing me to my family. There were problems with bills and problems with personalities. Rob is a damn good friend and I really care about him but after a year its hard to be a roomate with him. I felt so bad when I had to tell him, I didn't know what to say and I went through hell that day. I felt worse because I couldn't tell him in person but over the phone. So now Rob is quite upset with me, he apparently never wants to talk to me again and in a way that breaks my heart. Rob has been my friend for a long time and I hope honestly that him and I can work things out and be friends again one day soon. I've talked to Keven in the past month and I tried to settle things with him. There were a lot of things that were said and done back during the drama that was hurtful. Some things he said to me I will take a long time being able to forgive him for. But I've tried, I extended the olive branch. I feel like Keven doesn't understand why I have been upset with him, at the same time I feel like he absolutly hates me. All in all it bugs me. I feel like I am still blamed for a lot of the drama that happened even though I stayed out of it. Katie has said that she doesn't blame me and such but I still feel that in some way Keven does have some sort of animosity to me towards what happened. So today was the day of hell, a flash point of stress. Today I tried to talk to Katie and I tried hard to tell my side. I poured my heart and soul into it because I would never say anything bad about her. But at the same time Rob and Keven made a trip over to finish moving stuff out of the apartment. Daniel told me the whole time what was going on and there were some things said. Some things bad about me, and even some nasty things said to him. So here I am, at work, trying to reason with Katie and to try and work things out. Daniel is telling me what was going on at the apartment at the same time. My stress level hit the roof and I broke down.. For the first time in a long I felt like the world was coming apart at the seams. My bestfriend and someone that I care deeply about was doubting my intentions and feelings to her and two people that really don't like me were tearing the apartment apart. By the end of it all, I was and have been scared. It seems like the world has turned against me and I fear waking up in the morning, I fear what will happen next. One can only cry so long...

Wow, someone loves me.. For the past few days I have noticed that someone keeps logging in as me on icq. I had to change my password today because whoever it is logged in atleast 5 times while I was working lastnight and twice this morning. I hate people sometimes. On a lighter note I spent the weekend up in Oregon on the Sumpter Valley Railway. It was nice to finally go up and meet everyone that I've exchanged emails with. I even got to ride behind the first doubleheader since 1996. I also learned something interesting from the trip, Highway 395 is pretty much the same from Reno to Alturas as it is through the Owens Valley, one big desolate pile of dirt. It was a nice trip though and hopefully I will have some pictures developed soon to put in the photo gallery which is sorely out of date. I spent all my time last night at home working on bills and figuring out the split costs between my roomates and I. This week I am going to focus on getting a lot of things squared away and settled. Hopefully I will get to sit down and have some long talks with a few of the people that are upset with me. I am tired of feeling hated and I miss a lot of them. In the past few weeks I've gotten a little overly upset at some of them when I shouldn't have, in the end it made me bitter towards them which is something that shouldn't have happened. The past few months I know I have upset some people, and hurt a few people. I realised last night what I have been doing wrong, and I foolishly hurt someone I never intended to. Instead of listening to my heart and what I've been told directly, I went by an assumption I fabricated in my head because I was sad, jealous and in many ways just scared. My heart cannot convey how truely sorry I am for what I did, I should have known better, and for one brief moment, I didn't. If you are reading this journal (you know who you are), I am truely sorry, what I did was stupid and its what I get for not listening to you, for not just talking to you and asking you. The past few months have been a sort of mess, and I've shut out a lot of people in my life, people that I never should have. I miss Rob and I miss Keven, they were always good friends, and yes we had disagreements and got upset with each other. But things have gone on too long, it sometimes takes time to sort things out but they are my friends and they always will be. I can't hate them, I never have, and I never will.
I can't sleep.. I tried to sleep, but all I can do is lay in bed and cry. I have out lived my usefulness. For the record.... The only crime I have ever been guilty of.. Is that of love.

Hell week continues.. There is a battle raging on in my heart. The past few days has really been hell. It seems that everyone around me is having a terrible time in their lives. I have been trying to help them out, and keep them with their heads above the water. Yet at the same time I can't do that for myself. I've heard in the past few days that I am a terrible friend, and at this point I wonder why anyone would say that about me? Better yet, what did I do? I seem to have done nothing but mope around all day. I feel numb and I am confused. Maybe I really am a terrible friend and I just don't realise it? I kicked Rob out of the apartment.. I kept away from Keven because he told me that I didn't matter to him.. I kept away from others because I didn't want their drama in my life.. Yet for some reason because of these things, I've become a terrible friend. What is worse is the one person I want to talk to, isn't talking to me. Right now I don't know what to do, my bestfriend and someone I care about doesn't want to talk to me. No one else wants to talk to me or see me except some coworkers, Daniel and Biff. I need my Katie right now. I know that she doesn't believe me or trust me right now and that breaks my heart. All I have ever done is love Katie and treat her the same way I would want to be treated in return. I've told the truth on all things good and bad. And now after 3 years I feel like she doesn't care, that she's forgotten about me and how I feel. I know how I feel.. I know I hate the drama.. I know that I care about her more than anything in the world. She's my bestfriend... She's my heart and soul... Why am I the only one that truely knows this? All I want to do right now is cry... Which I guess in this case is the best thing.

I can no longer keep playing this game.. Things have to change.. Everything I know I trust I love All leave in the end.. I bare witness to the solemn wind in my life I cannot find what I've lost A shadow where light once graced I, creator of my own purgatory Like the warmth of summer, gone I am the winter Cold Forbidding Terrible Oh unholy day If I leave now I might get away I will forever pay... I will run and I'll be ok...

Well Christmas is coming up. WOOO! Jeni got me kick ass Christmas presents, I can't believe someone actually got me something I WANTED@!! She's such a sweetheart :) Daniel, Marcus and Alicia are all MIA this week, yay a boring apartment to myself.. Blargg... Atleast I get to see Celeste Thursday, its been a while since I saw her, it will be good to see her and the family. Not to mention I have a lot of people to call and wish a Merry Christmas. Heck I even get to see all my family this week. Shocking huh? However on the "bad" side, my car is REALLY starting to crap out. I need that tune up bad. BAD BAD BAD! Thankfully I get paid this week. So far the week has been boring, work, and work oh yeah and more work. Anyway, time to get back to work. heh oh and here is the Fark quote of the day: Posted By: Hep_Cat_Swing "WTF.....a tribute to CREED?!!! I make a tribute to to creed every time I take a dump. creed sucks"

Well Ebay goodies are arriving in droves. I can't believe I won as much stuff as I did. My collection of old railroad stuff is growing. Maybe one day it will all be worth something. ;) I have been having strange dreams lately... Dreams of being fired, people I haven't seen in a long time, Katie... It seems everything is fair game in my dreams.. Whats weird is that its always something familiar in an unfamiliar place. Anyone know what that means? Other than strange dreams things are normal. I am glad its Friday, I need a well deserved rest this weekend. Oh and Return of the King rocked!!! Enough for now. Fark Quote Of The Day: Posted By: LesPhilky " GameHudsonOver When you play the intelligence card in a post that looks like a 6th grader wrote it, anything's fair game. That's like a one-legged man telling a track star he can't run worth shiat."

Been a while since I posted here. For the most part I have been busting ass to get bills caught up. Looking for a new job and working on finding a place to live in Sacramento. Exciting no? Other than that I have been spending a lot of time with the people closest to me around here. Jeni, Daniel, Marcus and Alicia. I have also realised that I am an Ebay Addict.. not that its a bad thing.. wait... uhh.. anyway :) I must cut this short for now. Here is a little bonus the Fark Quote of the day! Headline: "Holy crap, they actually did it. Virginia Attorney General files felony spam charges, arrests asshat spammer" Posted by: Ms Information "Hmmmmm.... Does this mean I shouldn't be sending all of you ads for penis enlargement potions any more? No more encouragements to invest in Nigerian capital ventures? No more X10 cams? No more pr0n site come-ons with lurid flashing gifs? Fine. You'll miss me when all the emails you get are from people who actually know you."

Its January 14th.. Which means tomorrow is Katie's birthday! HAPPY BIRTHDAY KATIE!!!!!! In the past year I've watched you grow so much. It has been a hard year for you I know, but on this special day I want you to know that I am proud of you. I always will be. Be at peace on your birthday, and know that you are in my heart. The journey of a thousand miles begins with but a single step. :)

I noticed and had it confirmed that the very front part of my hair is in fact turning grey! I even have a perfectly white hair in my goatee. I am such an old man ;) Next week is Katie's birthday and being a good friend I got her a gift. We all know that I am such a sucker when it comes to getting gifts if I can afford it. Usually I have to make presents for people and there is nothing wrong with that. Sometimes I can splurge and get people something neat. Of course I always safe those gifts for birthdays. :D Anyway, most likely Katie will kick my ass for what I got her, but its simple and thoughtful. I am feeling better than I did a few days ago. My morale seems to have improved, and I am not feeling so low anymore. I am still very tired however, thats pretty normal though. I even applied for a new job yesterday with Union Pacific. Thats right, I vowed to do something I'd never do and try to get a railroad job. However I would be doing fueling/sanding of locomotives if I got it, so its not as bad as say an engineer or conductor job.

Well its a new year. Oddly it doesn't feel like a new one. It feels like last year just started all over again. I started the year off with a bang. People mad at me, the never ending exhaustion WOOO! This is all starting to get old. Everyday I wake up, is just another day I lose more of my soul. I no longer feel like wanting to do anything, all I feel is that I don't want to be here. I don't want to feel like I do. I am so tired lately, I have no energy to go out anymore. No will to do anything, as if my life lacks motivation. I feel like I've hit a wall. Sometimes I feel like the sole purpose I am still around is to save others. But if thats true, then who saves me? Why is it in helping others, being there for them that only then do I feel better? Why does part of me want to run and never come back? Why does part of me know that I am needed here? There are so many things I miss these days. Places, People, Experiences.. All I feel is that most of them will never come around again. I guess I just feel like the world has passed me by, like all I can do is stand and wave. I wonder if those who have left me will ever remember me, or if they'll think of me. Remember we used to dance.. and everyone wanted to be.. you and me.. I want to be to.. What day is this.. Besides the day you left me.. What day is this... Besides the day you went...

Another 2 weeks has passed since I wrote in here... Go figure.. Model building is going good, projects are starting to get done thankfully. :) There was an unfortuant incident with the new airbrush over the weekend, looks like I need a compressor. I am making progress on the current TrainSim models hopefully I will get one done this weekend, the Sumpter Valley Coach is the first project. Lately I've been talking to my friend Nicole who is off exploring Australia and New Zealand. Apparently she's met quite a hot chick in New Zealand that she's gaga over. Congrats to her. ;) Daniel got his new toy today. A 1:20.3 model of Eureka and Palisade #4 the Eureka . We are going to do some hacking on it to make a model of North Pacific Coast #7 the Tamalpais . Ok I am sure I didn't spell that last name right, so deal!. Katie has made it back home alright thankfully, I have been worried about her. She seems to be in a lot better mood than before she left. I knew getting away for a while would do her some good. Venéa, Le meluvan úne ar alye lúmessen tenna nurucilie. ;) Work is going good and the car is holding out I am pleased to report. The next thing I need to fix is the brakes which are getting bad. Next paycheck! (I say that every paycheck). Thats it for now...

Good news gang! Got the car tuned up over the weekend. Only cost $200! *gag* We destroyed one of the spark plug wires on accident so they had to be replaced. Problem is they cost $100 for the set! and I had to wait a day for them to get here. What a pain in my ass! However now that the car is back in good running order, I should save money on gas costs driving to work. Which in turn, helps me eat and stay alive. All of this of course means one project down and several more to finish. This week I still need to: Finish work for the website www.houdini.com. Send out a Valentines Day card to someone special. Get my car registered. Give the car a good cleaning inside and out. Oh and I might as well organize my desk too if I have nothing else to do. WHAT AN EXCITING LIFE I LEAD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Actually I have been trying to find something to do on Valentines Day. Sadly, no luck there, I'm not cool enough I guess :P I guess me and my best friend Mr. Wild Turkey will stay home that night ;) Oh well can't win them all Or can I? Oh.. Here is a funny message exchange from today: Marcus: hey brain dead, is it alright if I play unreal tournament on your computer Marcus: and eat cheese at the same time Me: you want to eat unreal cheese and play tournament on daniel's face? what? Ok not that funny.. Feh..

Today I did something shocking SHOCKING!!!!! ok maybe not that shocking. I started working on my Nevada County Narrow Gauge pictorial book I've been planning to write. Yes thats right, I am writing a book. I started basic layout of the cover today and one of these weekends I will start gathering up photos from the museum at first. I still have a number of places to use as sources. But hopefully in time I will get more of it done, I have the basic layout and idea of the structure done I just need to get to work. I am glad its Friday, this week has seemed to go by beyond slow... Now this weekend its tune-up time for the car, and maybe I will get to hang out with my friend Cindy, I haven't seen her in a long time. I miss her bunches, just as I miss all my old friends. Tonight Daniel and I are heading down to a model ra ilroad club in Sac, it should be interesting. I have to bring something along to run apparently. If I had something to run things would be ok ;) however since my change of Era I don't have much of anything to show anymore. I guess I could take the V&T Mckeen, but its extra cheesy to bring just some stock brass model if you ask me lol. Oh well eh? Well, I don't have much else to add tonight, other than todays fark quote of the day. Ok so I stole this yesterday from a thread about the President threatening an amendment banning gay marriages. The poster of this message about made me shoot coffee out of my nose. Posted by: chaosdeathgerbil I, for one, am not gay.... But i would much rather take it in the ass than be some closed minded, inbred, budwiser chugging, bible thumping, sister humping redneck sheeple.

I must say that the past few weeks have been some of the most productive weeks I've had in quite a while. Atleast in the world of model building. ;) So far I've finished about 8 models for Daniel and to sell on ebay. TrainSim models have been lacking but I have been doing a little work on them here and there. Other than the above mentioned "fun" the world has been kind. Over the past 2 weeks I've been fed up with spam. I took it upon myself to fight spam in everyway I could. After checking out the message source of nearly 100 spam messages I figured out some "keywords" most people wouldn't figure out. Basically I found odd key coding that comes from 2 things.. 1. The programs the spammers use. 2. links the spammers use directly. There appears to be a "glitch" or intentional code in some spammer programs where after every = sign in an HTML email it adds '3D' and example would be: align=3D"center" so by blocking messages containing "align=3D" that knocked out a number of spams. The next part is the links, well rather than simply block the address of the link, I took it a step further and blocked the variables the spammers try to pass in the links. The variables would be the bits that say ?hpsales= in the link address. "?hpsales" in checking out these tags I found these variable names appear to be unique to specific spammers or "companies". Based on the junk I was getting the 3 most common were: ?hpsales, ?nights and ?AFF_ID. This combined with my ISPs spam filtering has knocked my incoming spam level from 500-600 messages a day to around 140 messages. I still haven't beat all of the spam but I knocked it down to a managable level. My spam filters are picking up ~400 messages a day now which means less time I have to delete crap! :D I am toooooo proud of myself! Enough for now.

I'll be the first to admit it, at the risk of being called a "nerd". I have always been a fan of Star Trek, however like all things I take it in moderation. I keep up on the latest news, and I keep up with the current series "Enterprise". Sadly "Enterprise" has suffered from its share of issues and has slowly been losing a viewing audience. This season has turned things around story wise and brought the show up to par, but the damage is done. Star Trek is dying.. As sad as it sounds, and as much as I hate to say it, I think its time Trek took a break once Enterprise is over. It seems to me that the people in charge have no idea to write good tv and at worst they don't even know how to please fans. This downward trend started with Voyager and continues to this day. Don't get me wrong, I still watch, and Enterprise has been 1000x times better this season than any of the previous and dare I say it, MOST of Voyager. However one thing I've noticed in the past few months is the large compliment of fanboys who: A. Are mad that Capt. Kirk died. B. Want to see him come back via movie or other media. C. Think bringing back Kirk will "save" the franchise. Sure sure Kirk is a hero, he's part of our culture now, etc.. But these fans fail to realise something. With the poor shape Trek is in now, bringing back Kirk will do one thing: turn the average American against Trek. There is a strong fan base for Star Trek and there will probably always be one. However what keeps shows on the air and sells movie tickets are stories and characters the average American can understand without having to see 10 movies and countless hours of TV. It is because of this reason, that we need to let Kirk rest in peace. I present to you my evidence WHY he should remain dead. urlLink www.bringbackkirk.com I happened to watch their new "Trailer II" tonight, and frankly I am disturbed. This 9 minutes of spliced together soundbytes, CGI models and recycled movie/tv clips stands out in my mind as one thing: The biggest steaming pile of fan boy masturbation EVER! I hate to speak down to people who spent their time doing this. However even being a moderate fan I can pick apart 50 good flaws in what is being passed off as a story (more like a 100 page story with only pages 1,10,20,30,40,50,60,70,80,90 and 100). This is the sort of thing that would kill Star Trek for good. Its time the Trekkers out there realize the facts before hand. What makes you happy and what you want to see, is not going to help the franchise. Sure keep continuity there, keep nods to other shows, bring in a guest character or two from time to time. Please, Please, Please don't beat a dead horse anymore. Kirk died, he even died the way he knew he would. Making a movie where every Star Trek cast and ship is jammed into one movie would have the same negative reaction as Greedo shooting first. Whoops wrong Sci-Fi there, but you get the point. Star Trek needs to get back to the core of what the show means, exploring humanity through a set of metaphorical eyes. We don't need old characters, explosions, and fan boy circle jerks to accomplish that. You want to save Star Trek? Write Paramount, demand Berman's head on a plate and save the show by bringing in new blood, not only in the production/writing department, but by appealing to the rest of the viewing public out there. I am stepping off my soap box now. - Self Admitted Closet Star Trek Fan Since 1994 -

A few days ago I recieved an email from Jim Wilke. For those of you who don't know, Jim Wilke is responsible for the correct paint now on the replica steam locomotives at the Golden Spike National Monument. Jim had found his way to my TrainSim modelling page and was impressed by the work the group and I do. He made a request, and an interesting one at that. The recient DSP&P Tiffany Reefer model I finished is done up in the "accepted" paint scheme the cars had. However Jim has found a paint sample from the 1890s of a standard gauge Tiffany reefer in the "official" Mint Green color. So his request was for me to paint the DSP&P Tiffany to Mint as an experiment. After guessing and guessing for a while I found a color he said was "very close" and I plan to release this car as a seperate download in a few days. Well now, why am I not showing a picture of it here? Simple answer, its a suprise! That and its not quite finished yet. I actually am starting to like the mint color and its very unique from what most people expect to see on a freight car of that period. When I get the color and new numbering finished I'll post a shot, until then, you'll just have to wait. In other news: Today was payday and for once I have some extra money!!!! So I bought some lottery tickets ($8 worth) and managed to win $6 back. Not bad I suppose. I think I will treat myself to a good dinner tonight, then a shower and then relax.. Its been a friggin long week so far.

Some of you that know me, know that I always have very strange dreams. The past couple months alone have been no exception. I decided I'd describe the most common reoccuring dreams, as well as one completely weird one that left me with a WTF in the morning. Dream 1 The Weird: In this first dream, for some reason my mom moved to Alaska, and my family and I went up to visit her.. But the part of Alaska she lived was like a jungle almost (you could see glaciers in the distance in the mountains). At one point I was walking across a bridge and happened to meet up with a swimmer who bet me that they could swim across the river faster than I could run across the bridge. I won the race but her and I became friends throughout the dream. Then whenever my family and I would do anything up there we had to walk because there were no cars or streetsand the place was littered with rocks and machinery ruins. For some reason though there was also a strange little narrow gauge railroad that still ran up there which I saw pass by once in the dream (and quite fast too). There was this one section where we had to walk through this little creek that was under the forest canopy (the train tracks went though this creek too). I always noticed these cool colorful plants in the water as did my family and wondered what they were. Finally I wound up climbing up one of the trees and happened to look at my family standing in the creek. At this point I noticed those plants were actually HUGE centipedes like HUGE HUGE... Like 40 feet long and 6 inches in diameter those cool plants were their legs. It was frightening in the dream and then I woke up wondering WTF. If someone can figure what that dream means I'd love to hear it ;) Dream 2 The bad: In the first reoccuring dream I always see myself die in my dream... Its like watching a movie really, not seeing it all happen from my own eyes, but seeing this happen to myself as a 3rd party. It is always for some medical reason that never gets explained. In the dream Marcus and Daniel try to wake me up in the morning because I've overslept, it takes them a while before they realise what has happened. The dream always shows someone having to tell everyone what has happened which is always a head breaking moment or them. Some people do not take it well, and Katie always freaks out because of my death because she "wasn't there to save me". In the end I see my funeral and some beautiful words are said by some people there, sadly I never remember the words they say because I always wake up shortly after they are done. Dream 3 MORE Bad: This dream has be slightly more disturbing than others. It starts like this, my friend Nicole is over with her friend Sarah, her myself, Sarah, Marcus and Daniel are all hanging out in the living room goofing off. At one point I provoke Nicole and she lunges at me, knocking me over from the chair I am sitting on. But because of the way she hits me, she winds up breaking my neck on accident. I wind up being paralyzed from the neck down, In the dream this terrifies Nicole and she sort of "vanishes" after that point. What makes the dream horrible is the fact that I am left without the ability to do anything all of the things I loved to do I can't do anymore. Even the people I care about begin to vanish from my life one by one. In the dream I seem to suffer along for a while until I can't take it anymore and wish to die. However no one will kill me even though I wish to. In the dream I am left to hate my life as long as my natural life span. In the dream I never do die, I left tortured this way. Dream 4 My subconscious: In this dream, I am married to Katie, its some point in the future as we are quite a bit older than now. But the dream features not only Katie and I, but our daughter (who has no name that is mentioned). In the dream the three of us are walking along the cliffs in San Diego and for some reason Katie and our daughter slip off the edge of the cliff but are still holding my hand (our daughter is holding Katie's hand). I hold on the best I can, but the top of the cliff is sandy and I am slowly being pulled over the side too. Despite all of our screams for help, most people seem to ignore us. Finally a single person comes over and helps get us all back to safety, I never actually see this person in the dream to put a face or name to them, its just some unknown person. Safe in the dream I hold the two of them tight to me, crying. This is when I wake up, this dream is usually very traumatic and causes me to not be able to fall asleep again. Now some of you that talk to me regularly have noticed I seem to be erratic, very moody and can sometimes seem "lost". This is the reason, the past month I haven't slept well and I am plagued by dreams, worst of all I am remembering them which is something I rarely do. I only wish I could tell what dreams meant, if there is anyone out there that can decipher these for me, let me know. I would be very interested to find out the meaning.

Things have changed The world has changed I feel the earth around me I feel the wind against my face That which you counted on,are no more Dreams are now but distant wishes All you've wanted All youve seen Now just tears in the wind Mistakes Pain Love Joy In the end Your feelings blur That which is the end, is now the beginning Growth thrives before your eyes And I I shall remain a ghost Never set free The ghost you can't see Tye-méla Vénea

The lamp is burning low upon my tabletop, the snow is softly falling. The air is still within the silence of my room, I hear your voice softly calling. If I could only have you near to breathe a sigh or two, I would be happy just to hold the hands I love upon this winter night with you. The smoke is rising in the shadows overhead, my glass is almost empty. I read again between the lines upon the page, the words of love you sent me. If I could know within my heart that you were lonely too, I would be happy just to hold the hands I love upon this winter night with you. The fire is dying now, my lamp is growing dim, the shades of night are lifting. The morning light steals across my windowpane where webs of snow are drifting. If I could only have you near to breathe a sigh or two, I would be happy just to hold the hands I love and to be once again with you, to be once again with you. Tye-méla Vénea

Ahh yes yes its April Fools Day. Quite a bit of creativity this year I've gathered from around the net. Here is the list of things I saw today: The Sun had an interesting article on England's Traffic Cops training hawks with video cameras mounted on them to watch traffic from the air. Google was looking to hire employees to work their new server farm, on the moon (codenamed GCHEESE). Also Google apparently is starting up their own online email service called GMAIL, although they claim this is in fact legit. We shall see tomorrow wont we? Homestarrunner.com "apparently" had their domain taken over. The resulting cartoon from that was quite funny. Startrek.com had whole plethora of jokes including "Trekland" a revue of the album "Let It Be.. Naked Now" featuring select Next Generation actors on the cover. In addition there was a preview for the upcoming "Klingon Eye For The Human Guy" and an announcement for the upcoming Enterprise episode "She" which apparently will introduce the ultimate Xindi weapon; Cindy Brady. On the railroad front, CTC Board posted a picture of Union Pacific's latest efforts to hold on to trademarks, a Dash 9 painted into the Western Pacific F unit paint from the 70s. I also found reference to the "Atlantic Tunnel Project" on another site which outlines the efforts to build a tunnel under the Atlantic ocean to connect North America to England via railroad. Suprisingly the site is VERY well put together leaving one to wonder if its truely a joke or not. And Finally Fark.com, never to be out done went full force into the holiday spirit employing different random "pages" to replace their main page. These ranged from the site being hacked by Guinea Pigs (an old classic) to this gem right here: urlLink Click To View In New Window . The fun didn't stop there! Comments posted in the feedback sections were subject to the addition of random Homestar Runner quotes as well as language translation. Those are all the sites I could think of off the top of my head, I am sure there are plenty more I missed.

I've been relied on too much without getting anything in return. Sometimes I've done things and not gotten the credit for my work, rather the person would claim they did it all themselves. Its all too much, I need to get away for a while, I need to save myself before I completely lose it. This is the reason why I've wanted to move.. I can't keep going each day feeling like a time bomb, getting mad over things I shouldn't and being a prisoner in my own mind. I need to get out of here.. I need to go soon...

I find it funny that the one person I always talk to when I am at work, I've never met, and will probably never meet. Funny how things turn out huh? This is my last week in my apartment. I have been working on getting more things packed and ready to move. I hope to start moving things either tonight or tomorrow night, It should only (in theory) take a couple hours to move since I don't own much. It looks like I am going for the job interview in Denver next month for sure. Hopefully around the 10th is what I am shooting for. Work so far this week is going uneventful, I've been working on the webpage for the Foresthill Community Television station. I wish I had full artistic control for the page so I could make it "kick ass" sadly the only thing they have me doing is the basic page layout and putting in a few scrolling news bars and a flash animation. I was told not to spend too much time on the look and feel because its going to get changed anyway. Oh well I can't help that I suppose. :P

Its time to continue my previous "essay". So I present to you, Rules Part 2 : Addendum to Part 1. Grrl can also infer that the person chatting is a Lesbian. This was reported to me by Missy as its "fairly common". 13. Names consisting of a band name and another noun or adjective. These sorts are typically your crazy fan type of person. Commonly they will defend their favorite band to the death, sometimes going so far as to make statements that make no sense (I.E. 'Metallica is the greatest country band ever!'). However in addition to being a crazyed fan, they may also be an anti-fan. Typically anti-fans have "hate" or "die" somewhere in there with the band name. These sorts are the exact opposite of the crazed fan, lashing out insults about this band they hate and unchanging in their opinion. You will also hear outlandish statements from these types, though not often. Typically their arguement is "They Suck" or "They're Over-Rated". If you don't like to debate music, stay away from these folk. 14. Names consisting of Random Adjective + Random Noun or Random Adjective + Random Adjective. This is a broad classification, since typically you'll encounter a number of people with names like this. They can be anything from depressed to an EMO kid. Be leery of people with these names whining too much. Keep in mind these people might be nerdy as well, especially if their name is "Nerdular Nerdence". 15. Names using "Pixie", "Punk", or "Rock". Lets face it, no true punk calls themselves punk outwardly. Thats just silly. If you have the need to call yourself a punk and show it off to the rest of the world, chances are you're really an EMO kid who likes to think they are punk by listening to the bubblegum punk thats passed off as true punk these days. The same goes for Pixie and Rock, yes we know you like indie bands and yes we are sure you think you're better than the rest of us. But the fact of the matter is, your crappy EMO bands and small time elitist indie bands are usually typically lousy and reaffirm the fact that you have no decient musical taste. That being said, not ALL Indie bands are bad and not all EMO kids are bad, just some of them. 16. If the name contains "Thug", "Gangsta" or "Bitches". If someone is using this in their name, expect them to be a wannabe gangsta or typically a suburban white boy who thinks he's "the shit" because he has a pimped out Honda, a stereo system that makes up for his lack of penis and "rolls" to the current gansta trends. They are not thugs, pimps, gangstas, or playas. They are sad little boys who try to act tough because they don't know how to exist in the REAL WORLD. Remember no matter how much they claim to be from the street, they aren't. 17. If the name has "Wiccan", "Witch", "Sorceress", "Sorcerer" or any other form of witchcraft related wording of their nickname. Typically this is in fact a Wiccan or someone atleast interested in that religion. However, watch out for names like "Wiccan_Gurl" or "Wiccan_Hottie". This combination of names from part one generally means the Wiccan part is simply for attention and they carry the same characteristics of the second part of the name. See Gurl and Hottie sections. In some cases the combination of words can give interesting results. Expect someone named "Wiccan_Grrl" to be a complete poser princess type who thinks they are a lesbian (Lesbian for attention). 18. Names including "Doll". A person using this in their nickname is generally a very "Cutsy" type person who likes to think they are sweet and the "boys" should be honored to have them. In some cases this is true, in some its a lie. If cutesy people make you gag, you'd be well advised to stay away from the Doll types. 19. Names involving colorful language or racial statements. Lets face it, the Internet is not safe from idiots. There are certainly a fair share of ignorant racists out there, combine that with a veil of anoninimity you have one nasty combination. Often times these people will start ranting and upset someone, when said upset person tells the "racist" to shut up, the racist will tell them "Its a free country" (often forgetting at times, that websites are private property unless specifically noted as public). If the offended makes a valid arguement to the racist about why they are wrong, the normal response will involve "Liberal", "True Americans", "God" and or "Leave America". If you value your own sanity, try to avoid arguing with these people. 20. If the name includes "Nascar", "Hunting" or Anything Dale Earnhart related. Sometimes this person will be a type 19 in disguise. If this isn't the case, remember, their name potentially has "Nascar" in it. Enough said. Unless you like Nascar.. In That case have fun.. But don't talk to me.. Enough Said.. 21. Name looks foreign. Chances are, you're going to run into a foreigner online. If you don't then you must not go online much. For the Ladies, expect the guy to be typically horny or fall in love with you in 5 minutes (with out even talking to you or seeing what you look like). For guys, usually it will be some young girl who will want to talk to you constantly and never make any sense or understand what you're saying. In some rare cases this girl MIGHT tell you she loves you. While this might be any guys wet dream, think about it, how safe would it be to fly to Iran to meet some 15 year old girl? If you plan on living you'd be smart not to go. In either case, these people will not shut up EVER, and they will keep making nickname after nickname to annoy you for a while. Just keep your banning finger warmed up and you'll be fine. 22. The most important of all rules. Everyone you talk to on the Internet, excepting bots, is a real person. Some of the examples I've given here may not be correct for every possible instance, if you feel brave try talking to someone despite what their nickname might mean. You could be suprised. Most of all, try to be polite if someone isn't cute enough or they offend you accidentally. Remember there are millions of people online, and they can't read your mind. Be polite and just tell them you need to go if you decide not talk to them anymore. DON'T send them nasty messages like "FUCK OFF!" or "YOU'RE FUCKING UGLY" or things along those lines. They aren't polite and despite how full of yourself you might be, you're not the hottest thing on the block to everyone in the world. Be a decient human being and you might be suprised that you are treated the same in return. In addition, keep this in mind when looking at a nickname. If the name contains two words from different types I've mentioned above expect that person to carry both the traits or potentially just one. Its a mix and match game at that point. Just as everyone is diverse, so are nicknames.

Its no secret that I am a nerd to the extreme.. I deal with it, and so should you! j/k However, seeing as I've been chatting since 1996 I've determined a set of rules for determining what sort of folk you are dealing with BEFORE you talk to them. Follow these guidelines next time you talk to someone new and tell me how close I am. ;) A lot could be said from a persons nickname, some people are blatantly obvious about their character in them, some ironically describe the person without them realising it. Lets take a look at names shall we... 1 .If the potential chattee has a name that contains "hottie" chances are they are one of two things. a. Vain and Full of themselves, they will most likely not talk to you unless you, yourself are in fact "hot" by MTV/TV/Magazine Definition. These are typically the sort of people who think of beauty as a status symbol and therefore you have to make them more popular. Personality of these people generally borders on Shallow/Stupid. If you have any intelligence, avoid this sort of person. b. This person may not actually be hot in any way, in fact they may be the exact opposite. However because they have been deluded by thier "ultra-hot" friends into believing they to are in fact hot (I.E. because of status) they will want the same thing example A will want. Oddly enough, the demand for the "hotties" by the "un-hotties" typically is one most people avoid. Keep in mind, these "un-hotties" will in fact insult you just as bad as type A even though you you're self would get a higher score in a beauty contest than they would. Moving on.. 2. If the persons name is something along the lines of "IM2HOTT4U06". this personal is typically between the ages of 12-14. These people (usually always girls) think they know more about the world than anyone else and are exceptionally boy crazy. Typically these girls have the same desires as #1s but only apply their rules to the cute 16 year old hotties online. If you are older than 18 and one of these girls starts talking to you, be leery. Potentially the only people like this that talk to the over 18 crowd are the young white trash skanks who will most likely have 4 kids by the time they are 20 and live in a trailer park. Nothing good comes from talking to these type of girls ever, remember as you get older and the age difference gets bigger they are up to something if they are flirting with you. 3. Persons name looks like this "Sarah_Cam_xowyawjw". This person is some sort of porn bot.. Don't be fooled! If this person talks to you and "seems" real, test the AI. Ask them a question that would require a thoughtful answer, if the response reads like: "Oh I don't know...lets talk about sex instead" RUN AWAY! BLOCK THIS PERSON! 4. If the persons name contains BBW. By now, you should know that BBW stands for Big Beautiful Woman. However, this is often abused, typically BIG and WOMAN is right but the Beautiful got lost in translation. If you like bigger gals, more power to you. If you're a human stick and value you're bones, ignore this person. 5. If their name contains "Cutie" and "Pics". This might be a porn bot, but most likely is just an advertising nickname for some sort of porn site or cam girl. Avoid these. 6. If the persons name contains: "Gurl", "Grrl" or "Cute Boi". These must be broken down seperately, but they are very similar in definition. A. Gurl: This person comes from the Princess school of thinking, ideally they grow up believing they are the most important person on the planet and if you don't submit to them, you're not worth the time. Typically these people are between 12-16. B. Grrl: This is the 17-21 year old version of type A. They eventually move from princess mode into Avril Lavigne mode and like to believe they are tough and don't take anything from anyone. These sort of people will claim that something in their life is horrible and they're mad at the world because of it (I.E. Drama). C. Cute Boi: When the "Grrl" type grows up (22-?) they become a combination Princess/Avril Lavigne girl. Typically they are tough, in your face but want a sweet boi to submit to them. Hence, coming full circle from where they started. At this point they have become so disillusioned with drama that at any sign of a problem, they'll just tell someone to fuck off or hate them for a while. Sadly I am not sure what happens after this point. There has to be a 4th step, I just haven't seen it yet. In dealing with these types, be warned that if you don't submit, you're going to be blown off. At later stages you'll just be called an asshole. 7. If the nickname contains: "horny", "penis", "tits", "2night" or "lover". This is a person after one thing, sex and only sex. Typically these would be the playa guys and slut chicks. However you will also encounter the Cheating Boyfriend/Girlfriend or Derived Wife/Husband. If you're looking for a one night stand, these are the people you talk to. However, around these people don't let on that you might be attractive, OR single. You WILL get hit with a million messages from dirty old men/women or horny 16 year old boys. If one of them wants to talk to you, just ignore them, unless of course thats what you're looking for. 8. If their name contains "Cowgirl" or "Cowboy". By default cowboys on the internet are right up there with people from group 8. Typically they just want something to rope and wrangle.. in bed. Better yet, no matter how sweet a cowboy sounds, he's got a 75% chance of being a total redneck and or bigot. If you yourself are a redneck/bigot, this is the type of guy you are looking for. If not watch out. Occasionally a cowboy will message a non-cowgirl with tales of wild nights in bed (out on the range?) and gloat that they have a big penis. However, keep in mind these guys drive BIG TRUCKS and we all know what that means don't we? ;) A "Cowgirl" is going to want one thing, a cowboy. They don't care about anyone else unless you have a tight fitting pair of wranglers on to show off your supposedly "nice" ass. Why does a cowboys ass look nice? Because the Wranglers form the lifeless blob of an ass into looking decient. Any person that truely rides a horse has a flat ass, why? becuase the constant motion of your ass beating on a saddle beats it flat. 9. People with "Darkess", "Vampire" or "Mistress" in their name. This area is sketchy but typically most people who put "Darkess" in their name preceeded by an adjective are young girls or gay guys that like to think they are Goth when in fact, usually its not. Remember if they are 13 and claim to be Goth, they in fact are posers. No one is goth at 13. Don't argue, its true. If the name contains all three of the above listed words, they most likely have some Role Play scenarios they'd like to work out with you. Chances are they are probably a large person OR have been with so many people that they are looking for a new frontier in sex. On the same token, some of these people are honest genuine people and you may or may not share the same interests you do. Chances are if you like Vampires, their name has vampires in it and they aren't 13 you'll get along. 10. A quicky. If the name has "69" in it but nothing sexually related in the name, its a safe bet they in fact do not want to see your penis. Sorry. 11. Name looks like this ~*$@R@h*~ or has any sort of replacement of normal letters with special characters. Based on the area you are chatting this will either be a script kiddie OR some sort of person who thinks they are computer savvy because they found character map and spiced up their boring name "Sarah" to read ~*$@R@H*~. If its a script kiddie (they'll talk in "leet" speak about their exploits, how much the xbox sux and PS2 Ownz joo, etc) try not to piss them off, they'll try to "hack" you and usually fail unsucessfully unless you are a retard yourself. Im All Dat and Hott N I HAtE U Bcuz Yur UgLy. These people in fact need to be slapped. Some of them are so terminal you'll have no idea what they are saying because they use so many letters and numbers in place of ACTUAL WORDS you'd think they were playing Bingo or something. 12. Name is like "Justins Girl" or "Sarahs Boy" or "I love Tim!". These people will drone on and on about their significant other or their crush at the moment. Unless you're a chatty girl who is going to tout your crush back, stay clear of these people. With that I am going to stop here for the day. I think I set a record for length of journal entry today. Saturday was the 1 year anniversary of the NCNG museum in Nevada City. We had a big gathering up there and it was quite an event. We had old cars on display and our diesel switcher as well as the little Porter steam engine were running. Shuffling cars around the yard. The F&CC boxcar which I've put a lot of work in made its first public appearance, its truely the most beautiful piece we have. Saturday was also my Mom's birthday so after the museum I went down and spent some time with her and her crazy dog. My mom found my long lost letter opener that I've been trying to track down for years, Its good to have it back :) Then I met up with Sarah and Katie and went to Dennys for some food, after that we went down to Matts and met up with the gang and hung out. I accidentally elbowed Sarah in the nose and felt like crap the rest of the night. Late at night Daniel and I decided to hit a local bar. However the bartender aka little hitler kicked us out because he didn't "recognize" Daniel's military ID. Daniel was upset and said some choice words at which point the guy grabbed a wooden chair and threatened to throw it at Daniel as well as kick his ass. Needless to say we were distraught by the events so we went home and drank. I did talk to some cops over at 7-11 about what happened and they told me that they have a lot of trouble with that guy and that when his boss gets back he's going to get fired. Sunday nothing really happened, I sat at home, went to the movies with Sarah and Katie but forgot to eat before hand so I was miserable. I got food afterward and brought something for Daniel. The rest of the night I sat at home. Someone was talking to me today about nicknames for some reason, and I figured up a list of the nicknames I call people and they call me. Some of them I don't say around the person, I just use it when referring to them with my friends. Names I Call People: Keven - Chuckles or Kevvie Bonnie - Bonnilicious Katie (Foresthill) - Spicy Asian My Katie - Dr. Katie or Shady Jeni - Jenijeni Johnny - Grandpa Herman - Herman-man Jonathan Lewis - The Kid Allen - Mik Sarah - Aranel Iris - Model Chick Matt - Matticus Craig - Craigy Nicole - Ambrose Brian - Deetchler Names People Call Me: Hoss - Allen Honky or Honks - Keven Old Man - My Katie Lazy Ass - Biff Long Bug or Bug - Sarah and Nicole Nerd or TrainGeek - Bonnie Biscuits or Son - Johnny I am sure I missed a few but those are the ones I could think of off the top of my head.

I've been asked why I feel its time to leave here for a while. The reasons are complicated, some are not ones most people would expect. I've lived in Auburn for as long as I can remember and I've made many life long friends here. But Auburn isn't the same as it once was, I remember an Auburn with open space, friendly people and genuinely a wonderful place to live. As much as I love it here, everything is changing. I remember just 4 years ago being able to drive from Lincoln to Roseville and the landscape being beautiful open countryside. Something you are hard pressed to find out there now. I remember the roads leading from Auburn all went into the unknown for a kid. The world seemed huge in these eyes. The only thing you could see were the beautiful golden rolling hills, and air as clean as could be. If gold was still to be found in the foothills, this was it. I've watched for years as the beauty of the world around me has been stripped, paved and turned into mini-malls, subdivisions and churches. The best example of this is the drive south from Lincoln. Turn onto Industrial Blvd and drive what was once the old "highway" to Roseville. Right before you hit the road to the Casino, notice the landscape around you, grasses, creeks and a place full of life. Look further out and see the new housing developments, the Casino, the industries and take another look at the area directly around you. At one point, this is all there was, the beauty of the California hills, and valleys at your fingertips, a site now soon to vanish into the sea of pavement. To me, the nature of the west is my spirit, every passing month the dark ocean swallows the natural beauty here and my soul. One day what beauty is left will simply be another suburb of Sacramento, a soulless wasteland where beauty once reigned. My soul longs again for the beauty of nature, the freedom to stand on a hill at dusk and know that for miles around you are away from it all. It is for this reason that I am at home in the mountains, in the plains or standing next to the ocean. My heart, my soul and my clarity in life has always been the open space. With out that space, I lose who I am, and all I will be. So the title of this entry, "The Last Resort" is a title of an Eagles song, one approprate to how I feel. Download it for yourself and listen to the message.
